title: Behavior of function from graph of derivative

content.question: The graph of f', the derivative of f, is shown above. The line tangent to the graph of f' at x = 0 is vertical, and f' is not differentiable at x = 2. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: f' does not exist at x = 2
f is decreasing on the interval (2, 4).
The graph of f has a point of inflection at x = 2.
The graph of f has a point of inflection at x = 0.
f has a local maximum at x = 0.

content.answer: The graph of f has a point of inflection at x = 2.
